item.title: Utilities
item.description: Overview Convert Image to Base64 RSA Encryption Convert Image to Base64 Converting an image into Base64 string means taking the binary representation of an image and converting it into a string of ASCII digits (A-Z, a-z, 0-9). To convert an image into Base64 : use https://codebeautify.org/image-to-base64-converter After uploading the image and converting into Base64 string, copy the string and use it in the response body of API which expects it.
